MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-DEC-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the DG9 area of Stranraer, affecting properties in Little Tongue and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am due to repairs required to our overhead electricity network in the Pinwherrie area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:12am on Monday, 14 December 2020
